name: Square Rooting For You (tanmayk)
description:
The game "Square Rooting For You" is based on the theme 'Roots' for Global Game Jam'23. The character is inspired by a tree root and has the task to save the tree by taking the water packets through the roots and heal the damaged roots with these water packets.

The character evolution has been set on the rule of mathematical square and square root. The head no. and tentacles can be changed (Form change) wherever needed to proceed in the game. 

The game has been made by a team of 4 - Tanmay Karan, Sunhik Pramanik, Snehal Ukarde & Chinmay Karan
